article.title: U.S. Navy Modifies Array Technical Support Center Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Services Incorporated, Gaithersburg, Maryland, is being awarded a $36 million contract modification for the operation of the Naval Array Technical Support Center to include production, repair, refurbishment, installation and testing of towed array sonar systems. The Space and Naval Warfare Systems Center Atlantic, Charleston, South Carolina, is the contracting activity.
